parameters.name: DagId
parameters.description: The task flow ID. You can call the [ListTaskFlow](~~424565~~) or [ListLhTaskFlowAndScenario](~~426672~~) operation to query the task flow ID.

parameters.name: Edges
parameters.description: The list of updated task flow edges.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The tenant ID.

> To view the tenant ID, move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner of the Data Management (DMS) console. For more information, see [Manage DMS tenants](~~181330~~).
